mapper.sql: select SEQ_TB_ECOM_CART.nextval as cart_id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_ORDER_PRODUCT_ITEM.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_ORDER_SHIP.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_PLATF_ORDER.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_PLATF_SHOP_ORDER.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_EXPRESS_PLATF.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_ORDER_EXPR_PLATF.nextval as id from dual
select 'R' || SEQ_TB_ECOM_ORDER_REFUND.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_RETURNS_ORDER.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_SELLBACK_GOODSLIST.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_EXCEPTION_INF.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_EXPRESS_CONFIRM.nextval as id from dual
select SEQ_TB_ECOM_RETURN_ADDRESS.nextval as id from dual
